body: Can someone explain how to knockback the other player out of the world in nebula. I've seen lot of people doing it. There is any special technic to knockback the others?
body_tagged: Can someone explain how to knockback the other player out of the world in nebula. I've seen lot of people doing it. There is any special technic to knockback the others?
title: Knockback out of map

replies.body:
hit hit blockhit, hit hit blockhit.

And keep spamming w or your forward key.
replies.body_tagged:
hit hit blockhit, hit hit blockhit.

And keep spamming w or your forward key.

replies.body: The block hit! holy crap i play with 1.8 :(
replies.body_tagged: The block hit! holy crap i play with 1.8 :(

replies.body: Click fast + Good ping + Good aim = Done
replies.body_tagged: Click fast + Good ping + Good aim = Done

replies.body: air combo ezpz wombo 10 block jitter click 30 cps!!!!!! no block hit, that is for noobs. :^)
replies.body_tagged: air combo ezpz wombo 10 block jitter click 30 cps!!!!!! no block hit, that is for noobs. :^)

replies.body: Spam sprint and occasionally shift and block-hit :3
replies.body_tagged: Spam sprint and occasionally shift and block-hit :3

replies.body: When you are about to attack your opponent, get onto the side opposite the edge, and attack from there using the tactics mentioned above.
replies.body_tagged: When you are about to attack your opponent, get onto the side opposite the edge, and attack from there using the tactics mentioned above.
